docs.title: Home
docs.text:
An extension of Framework with added plugin support and methods.

Guides API Reference

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text:
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on Keep a Changelog, and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

docs.title: Fixes
docs.text: • Fixed a bug with an invalid .Widget prop

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Added API documentation to every function within the code

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Added new library API to create menus, toolbars, and toolbar buttons

docs.title: Roblox
docs.text:
1. Go to the latest releases page
  2. Download Standalone.rbxm
  3. Select Insert from file, and find Standalone.rbxm in your designated downloads folder

docs.title: Wally
docs.text:
1. Open a project in your favorite text editor
  2. Add lumin/plugin-framework@^0.3.0 to your wally.toml file
  3. Run wally install the project should be inside of your /Packages directory.
